scripts.dev: concurrently --names dashboard,firebase "yarn run next-dev" "yarn run emulators"
scripts.build: yarn run handle-config && next build && next export -o build
scripts.deploy: yarn run build && firebase deploy --only hosting:admin
scripts.deploy-all: yarn run deploy-functions && yarn run deploy
scripts.next-dev: yarn run wait-for-emulators && NODE_ENV='development' yarn run handle-config && ./scripts/wait-for-emulators.sh && NODE_ENV='development' node scripts/server.js
scripts.emulators: if ! nc -z localhost 5000; then cd functions && yarn run init && cd .. && firebase emulators:start; else echo Emulators running on localhost:5000; fi
